topic.title: Browser works slowly when i visit zeronet homepage.
topic.body:
My hard disk have stored over 3000 zeronet sites and everything goes fine. But my browser works slowly when i visit http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/ while it has NO PROBLEM in visiting other sites .
  It seems that  browser will load something unimportent without delay when i visit http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/ . 
Any good idea?

1_1ECmsQzFruxQnUt8DWmC2SKz3xL39XgzSa.body:
ok, let me introduce some zero sites to u, which is found by my scripts and may not interesting to u.
# Games 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KNMtbcaDhKXaU96MeU57BawDD9KX9xqkn/  [Chinese forum, u can find games here]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1RETRoPXWgnP5K5v7ggwBHTo7eyumPvq1/ [this site seems not work]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/14zQjCbU2BAy3uAUAXN5UJhq8YdAHyzUqK/  [html5 games]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JsJ1JitaLboc8pvo4fxh9dvP8mt6toPrE/ [snake game]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GamESVFyJfkmbxtcrLR2VX4m4VFmwyeRY

# leaked data

http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3SeSH7wvr3KqLiYQhbQRc9TCAPCbWeH/ [wiki leaks]

# Index / Search
or u can find interesting sites by yourself
http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ke63cWnTyqXB916hbYVh6naKUwW2xvsbd/ [2400+ zero sites, update recently]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/163ZAwi5BcGBm6UEwdJF1pkcejDMCT1kAj [search files on zeronet]

> [elspru](#comment_48_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib): I'd like to also add zirch search engine currently indexing over 3300 ziteshttp://127.0.0.1:43110/zirch.bit

Ok, got it :-)

2_1ECmsQzFruxQnUt8DWmC2SKz3xL39XgzSa.body: It seems terrible for Chinese. But how dose Chinese gov explain it to UN or the world? Chinese gov always said that chinese internet is filled with freedom and China has no problem in human rights.

> [cxbeat](#comment_3_1E4dgsD9i7VtW5ZEdGX6EbPewT1wrsczqY): As a Chinese I have to say that GFW is working with blacklist mode now. And I can visit Zeronet and talk to you now. GOV has blocked google youtube etc. We had to use the Shadowsocks to break the "wall" , however, the developer of it have already give up. It's still works today...

Try [this one](https://www.v2ray.com/) if shadowsocks* don't work someday :-)

> [infect](#comment_1_16rjsqjxFb6AqjW7Mxs5beWRFLBYoxMAAo): Hey, thanks for recommending this, seems interesting but im not able to speak chinese.. could you please explain me how to make this work on windows?

It has English manpage https://www.v2ray.com/en/ :-) I think v2ray is not easy to configure, so I haven't try it on any platform.

1_1J4miEbRYPUMBgTDd4J1CUxzusKcvHeP3b.body:
> [kmueller](#comment_35_1PvReUtzc5s92BWTUDnxvmVGepNcyA2otB): wtf, its not about welfare at all!

Haha
In chinese,  `福利`  is treated as videos/pictures/movies or something like that,  and all of them related to sex or porn.  And, if you put `福利` into Translator, you will get `welfare` in most cases. When someone says "You want some `福利`?"， he or she is asking you "You want to get some sexy picture or sexy video or porn?" clearly.
Interesting, isn't it?

> [clar](#comment_3_1BDNJcNDqjFMVVFH2zmGeV4VHrjecgQ5av): update every day. maybe more than 30 videos one day.

Are you maintainer of that site?

> [clar](#comment_5_1BDNJcNDqjFMVVFH2zmGeV4VHrjecgQ5av): yes.Any suggestions?

Yup, i want to know where u got so many videos. It's admirable.

1_1BXCYRHwwev9cdgoMdWvhgKrMvUp19p2R2.body:
> [binchan2](#comment_18_1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h): You can use this userstyle as a partial solution. Fix feed list, site list is not lazy loaded, so may be still laggy

Thank you very much. It's helpfull.

> [binchan2](#comment_18_1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h): You can use this userstyle as a partial solution. Fix feed list, site list is not lazy loaded, so may be still laggy

emmm
I have tried your css, but my browser seems still  works slowly .

> [binchan2](#comment_20_1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h): You may try to change all the value "serving": true to "serving": false in the /path/to/zeronet/data/sites.json and only resume the sites you want to keep updating from the site list panel. Remember to backup the file first before directly modify it.

This [proxy](https://fuckcf.cf/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D)  seems stored over 3000 zeronet sites  too, but browser works fine when it visit ZeroNet homepage.

2_1KaZdtwQRK3QjvL8NXMHAXcNy2xGi2qXmC.body: 连密钥都保存不好，还能干嘛

7_14UupgrdnT7Y8vMES7aqUFgD1fC5RYNrh8.body:
> [joczo](#comment_35_14UupgrdnT7Y8vMES7aqUFgD1fC5RYNrh8): The Distro is Linux Mint 17.3.I tried to put in autostart menu with 10sec delay,but nothing happens.Maybe my command is bad,but other things start fine..

You mean, launch zeronet after your computer  starting up?
Suppose that dir is '/home/me/Zero/', then
modify your `/etc/rc.local` like 
```
#!/bin/sh -e
cd /home/me/Zero/ ; python zeronet.py
exit 0
```

3_16UYTd5pL9rt4hhxQAmfX89QqmjJB58xDx.body: For anyone, he or she can mute the user who upload 'the bomb' and stop seeding  'the bomb'.
